Text.Page:
Volos has decided to send Himir to Lumbertown as the faeries' emissary.

That's good news, except for one thingâ€”Himir is a good ambassador, but a lousy soldier, and the rebellious faeries are bound to ambush her along the way.

Himir has some preparations to make, so I can save you some time and send you on ahead to the Woodland Path. She'll be safe enough on her way there.

Thank the gods you both arrived safely!

I'm sure Himir will make a wonderful emissary. She will be safe here under our protection.

You've done a wonderful job here today, . Talk to me when you're ready to go back to the Faerie Pond.

Himir is safe! By Isren's name, that is good news!

I'm sure the negotiations will take time. Lots of blood spilled on all sides.

But if you ever wondered whether you could make a difference here...wonder no more, .
